name: Gustblade
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder SPD +2.

name: Flareblade
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder RES +2.

name: Boltblade
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Grants wielder DEF +2.

name: Rapier
desc: Ignores DEF. Targets enemy's SPD instead.

name: Magebane Swd
desc: Grants wielder RES +10. Silences on hit.

name: Master Edge
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Swords.

name: Master Lance
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Lances.

name: Master Axe
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Axes.

name: Magebane Bow
desc: Grants wielder RES +10. Silences on hit.

name: Glimmer Ward
desc: Lowers enemy accuracy slightly on hit.

name: Fortune
desc: Ally gains +50 accuracy until next turn.

name: Mend
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to self and all adjacent allies.

name: Hammerne
desc: Repairs a weapon or staff to full uses.

name: Refresh
desc: Allows a unit to move again.

name: Sandblast
desc: Affects medium sized area. Blinds foes.

name: Blizzard
desc: Damages huge area. Inflicts SPD debuff.

name: Flux Ward
desc: Lowers enemy avoid slightly on hit.

name: Nyx Ward
desc: Recover HP equal to half damage dealt.

name: Ruin Ward
desc: Does half damage even on miss.

name: Searing Blades
desc: Shoot 3 fire blades at targets of your choice.

name: Spiritbane
desc: A draught that boosts the user's RES.

name: Barkskin
desc: A draught that boosts the user's DEF.

name: Energy Drink
desc: A draught that recharges all skills.

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently increases its user's maximum HP by 5.

name: Energy Ring
desc: Permanently increases its user's strength by 2.

name: Mana Ring
desc: Permanently increases its user's magic by 2.

name: Secret Book
desc: Permanently increases its user's skill by 3.

name: Speedwings
desc: Permanently increases its user's speed by 2.

name: Mithril Mail
desc: Permanently increases its user's defense by 2.

name: Talisman
desc: Permanently increases its user's resistance by 2.

name: Prim's Charm
desc: Grants Damage +2 and Damage Taken -2 against enemies with more HP.

name: Silver Card
desc: Can buy items for reduced cost.
